description: A React functional component named StatusBar that displays game status information including player scores, winner or draw notification, current turn, and a restart button for a Tic Tac Toe game.

methods.name: StatusBar({ turnPlayerName, scores, winner, isDraw, onRestart, gameStatus })
methods.description: React functional component rendering game status details, including scores, winner/draw messages, current turn, and restart button.

ctags.name: StatusBar
ctags.pattern: /^function StatusBar({ turnPlayerName, scores, winner, isDraw, onRestart, gameStatus }) {$/
ctags.signature: ({ turnPlayerName, scores, winner, isDraw, onRestart, gameStatus })
